channel.title: Helm sucht Kopf on IMI Showtime
channel.description: Recent content in Helm sucht Kopf on IMI Showtime

item.title: Development
item.description: Process Starting B3 - Berliner Feuerwehr: Helm Sucht Kopf, we began by analyzing the current fire department website to pinpoint its pain points and areas for improvement. Our key questions were: What’s not working? What could be improved? And how can we create solutions that meet the needs of users, stakeholders, and us? To better understand user behavior, we examined website statistics provided by the fire department, such as time spent on various pages and points of disengagement.

item.title: Features
item.description: Features To make sure we reach as many people as possible, we’ve included four main features: Classic Filter Page: Easily find the right opportunity by filtering based on your highest level of education and personal preferences. Quiz with a Storyline: Take a short, engaging quiz to test your personality and decision-making skills. Based on your answers, we’ll guide you to the entry path that suits you best. Interactive Video:
